job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWe are hiring a Machine Learning Engineer to join one of the largest global financial service firms in the world If you are a Machine Learning Engineer looking to leverage your past experience than please look below We are located in Jersey City although we are remote at this timeppbrppstrongWhat Is The JobstrongppAs a Machine Learning Engineer  keep in mind this is a Data Engineer position first Machine Learning is secondary you will be working on the companies new Asset Wealth Management AI team to develop high impact AI applications and platforms in the financial services industry You will design and implement highly scalable data processing pipelines and perform analysis and insights to drive and optimize business results as well asnbspexperiment develop and productionize high quality machine learning modelsppbrppstrongWhat Skills Do We NeedstrongpulliYou are a Data Engineer with Machine Learning ExperiencenbspliliPython and AWSliliExperience in ETL data pipelines both batch and realtime data processing Data warehousingliliMS or PhD in Computer Science Statistics or MathematicsliliExcellent communication skillsliulpbrppstrongNice To HavesstrongpulliMachine Learning Engineering ExperienceliliRliulpbrppstrongWho Are WestrongppWe are a toptier global financial services firm with assets of 2 trillion and operations in more than 60 works in our stateoftheart open workspace office in Jersey City We value teamwork and pride ourselves as an egofree cultureppbrppstrongCompensationstrongpulli170000  200000 base salaryliliBonusliliFull medicalliliFull Dentallili401kliulpbrppstrongWhats in it for youstrongppThis is an opportunity to work for one of the world best financial firms This opportunity offers a path
